Enabled.Name: Token Note Hover Enabled
Enabled.Hint: Show the token note on hover.

DarkMode.Name: Token Note Dark Mode
DarkMode.Hint: Show note with light text on a dark background.

FontSize.Name: Token Note Text Size Override
FontSize.Hint: Override the base text size for the token entry display. Example: 1.5rem.

MaxWidth.Name: Token Note Maximum Width
MaxWidth.Hint: The maximum width in px the note display can grow to before it will force wrapping.
